Subject: Request for Remote Troubleshooting Session on Client Uninstall and Upgrade Issues
Description:
Hi Support, 
We are currently facing issues with the client uninstall and upgrade features on teh EPP server, which are not working for endpoints with the EPP client installed. We would like to request a remote troubleshooting session to address these problems.
Could we schedule this session for Tuesday, July 30th, at 3 PM Indonesia time?

Thank you.

Regards,
Denni
What_We_Know__c:
Customer have an issue with uninstalling and upgrading the EPP client . 

We have performed several troubleshooting steps to verify and understand how the issue is reproducing.

On the latest update from the client, they have found in their event viewer logs that the user do not have enough rights to run the installation package.
Next_Steps__c: We asked the customer to run the installation using an administrator user to verify is the situation persist.
Solution_Comment__c:
no response. 

They need to use an Administrator user to be able to install the EPP in their endoints.
